00077     INLINE void timer_hw_irq(void)
00078     {
00079         /* Reset The match0 irq flag */
00080         T0IR = 0x01;
00081         /* Signal the VIC we have completed the ISR */
00082         VICVectAddr = 0;    
00083     }
00084 
00085     INLINE bool timer_hw_triggered(void)
00086     {
00087         return true;
00088     }
00089 
00090     INLINE hptime_t timer_hw_hpread(void)
00091     {
00092         return T0TC;
00093     }
